SELECT orderId "orderId",orderCode "orderCode",opTime "opTime", time1 "time1",time2 "time2",time3 "time3",time4 "time4",time5 "time5",time6 "time6", CEIL((time2-time1)*24*60) "time21", CEIL((time3-time2)*24*60) "time32", CEIL((time4-time3)*24*60) "time43", CEIL((time5-time4)*24*60) "time54", CEIL((time6-time5)*24*60) "time65", CEIL((time6-time1)*24*60) "time61" FROM( SELECT SW.ORDERID orderId,SW.ORDERCODE orderCode, MAX(OPTIME) opTime, MAX(TIME0) time1,MAX(TIME2) time2, MAX(TIME8) time3, MAX(TIME3) time4, MAX(TIME9) time5, MAX(TIME1) time6 FROM ( SELECT * FROM( SELECT SWSOG.ORDER_ID ORDERID ,SWSO.ORDER_CODE ORDERCODE, SWSOG.OP_TIME OPTIME,SWSO.PAYMENT_TIME PAYMENTTIME, DECODE(SWSOG.ORDER_STATUS, 0, OP_TIME) TIME0, DECODE(SWSOG.ORDER_STATUS, 2, OP_TIME) TIME2, DECODE(SWSOG.ORDER_STATUS, 8, OP_TIME) TIME8, DECODE(SWSOG.ORDER_STATUS, 3, OP_TIME) TIME3, DECODE(SWSOG.ORDER_STATUS, 9, OP_TIME) TIME9, DECODE(SWSOG.ORDER_STATUS, 1, OP_TIME) TIME1 FROM SYN_WMS_SALES_ORDER_LOG SWSOG LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_SALES_ORDER SWSO ON SWSOG.ORDER_ID=SWSO.ID )A
EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT distinct ORDER_ID FROM SYN_WMS_SALES_ORDER_LOG
AND OP_TIME >= to_date(#beginDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND OP_TIME < to_date(#endDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
AND ORDER_STATUS=1
)B WHERE A.ORDERID=B.ORDER_ID )
)SW GROUP BY SW.ORDERID,SW.ORDERCODE ORDER BY opTime )
